Each digit of ${22{,}000}$ is one place to the left of the same digit in the number ${2{,}200}$.

Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-: |:-:
$$ | $\greenD2$ | $\blueD2$  | $\purpleC0$ | $\maroonD0$
$\greenD2$ | $\blueD2$ | $\purpleC0$  | $\maroonD0$  | $\tealD0$

Moving each digit to the left means multiplying by $10$: 
  
${2{,}200}\times 10={22{,}000}$
